Description:
Lovely Elevated Home
This beautiful solid brick home will surprise the purchaser with the size of its rooms and the lovely backyard.
It has 2 very large bedrooms with built-in robes, a long large living with big windows to take in the view of the front garden, with adjoining kitchen and dining. This home is designed with the idea of keeping the bedrooms separate to the living areas. The home has lots of storage space, and a alfresco area that you would be pleased to use in the upcoming summer months. Security doors, quality curtains and drapes with sun-blinds to the windows add to this well maintained home. The garage adjoins the house and is close to the main shopping area for convenience. Truly worth an inspection to appreciate its size!
Insights: 61 Talbot Road, CLUNES VIC 3370 was last sold in 2013.

Description:
VICTORIAN CHARM CONTEMPORARY LIVING
Located in one of the most sort after pockets in the township of Clunes , this charming homes oozes Victorian charm coupled with period characteristics. All the modern conveniences required to comfortably enjoy this unique home, comprising of three spacious bedrooms including period style bathroom with claw foot bath , open plan kitchen /living with ducted solid fuel heater , & stunning polished baltic pine floorboards throughout making entertaining a delight. The open plan kitchen offers electric wall oven , electric hotplates as well as a fully operational combustion stove.
Beautiful French doors open out to a sensational entertainment area with pergola and built in BBQ. Well established and low maintenance gardens , vege gardens and there is a large double lock up garage with workshop. Land size is approx 485m2 . This stunning home is within walking distance to the Wesley College campus , local train station and main shopping precinct.
This home will be sure to impress.
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Amazing views from young dwelling on 40 plus acres.
We all wish for 360 degree views and this exciting property delivers. Only five minutes to Clunes this abode is just over seven years of age. The home surprises with three bedrooms and an office or alternative 4th bedroom. The residence has a formal lounge while the young kitchen is open plan to the dining. The acreage has quality fencing and has four individual paddocks for your livestock. The shedding is also ample with double carport, garage and a 13x7m shed. There is over 22,700 litres of tanks and a bore for your water supply and a great catchment area to continue to fill. Livestock can also utilise the 3 dams on site.
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Gorgeous 1538m2 Building Block!
Situated in the Historic Township of Clunes is this fabulous flat 1538m2 building block ready and waiting for you to build your dream home (STCA). You will be enchanted to find established garden and trees dotted about the property giving it a lovely homely feel, timber post and rail front fencing and all services available, including sewerage. The block also offers gorgeous views of Mt Beckwith and is a short stroll to the main shopping precinct and local Milk Bar. Secure this ideal building block today to avoid disappointment!

Description:
Fully Renovated Victorian Residence, in a Central Clunes Position
Sitting proudly in Service Street, Clunes Hilvern', circa late 1800's has been painstakingly restored and modernised. The location is brilliant, within easy walking distance to all Clunes amenities. The home offers 3 bedrooms, the master has an ensuite and all bedrooms have WIR's. The modern bathroom is completed with a shower, bath & vanity. The show piece of the home is the kitchen and living room which are a recent extension to include a modern kitchen with quality cooking appliances, adjacent to an L-shaped dining and lounge room. Original features include high ceilings, polished timber floors, lined ceiling boards and iron lace work on the veranda.
The land area is 1000m2 or a quarter acre, in the back yard is an old barn that has been restored. Downstairs consists of an open plan games room and upstairs is a mezzanine space. The gardens are fully established offering both shade and colour with a beautiful oak tree and north facing courtyard. Clunes is a 30 minute drive to Ballarat and Daylesford and 10 minutes to Creswick and Talbot.
For Sale Now or Auction Saturday 23rd February 2013 at 11am.
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Your piece of serenity on the outskirts of historic Clunes.
This inviting home fits comfortably on approx 1.5 acres of land. With room for the entire family the house is approx 21 square metres. All bedrooms are generous and will take your larger suite. The kids or adults will appreciate the 2 separate living areas and why not work from home in the office supplied. The functional kitchen is central to the home and has direct access to outdoor entertaining/pergola area. The abode has town water, tank water and solar panels to reduce your bills. This 28 year old property has only seen the 1 owner and truly feels like home. The little inclusions such as a sewing room or arts room, bird aviaries, well established vegetable garden, over sized car port and additional shedding completes the home and satisfies personal needs. Only 2 minutes to the hub of beautiful Clunes the property offers both great privacy as well as town services.
Insights: 99 Learmonth Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2013 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
'Brand New Stylish Home In Great Location'
Located in a lovely quiet street within walking distance to train station, hospital and CBD is this fine example of a modern conveniently located brand new home. Offering all the modern comforts with all facilities at your doorstep, move in and enjoy this beautiful home with 3 bedrooms, main with walk in robe and en-suite and the other bedrooms have built in robes.
Large spacious living areas with front lounge room, family room and open plan kitchen/dining, there is also another bathroom for the family and the home has polished floorboards, carpets and tiles throughout.
Extra features include stainless steel appliances, split system heating and cooling, sweeping verandahs to take in the uninterrupted views and a good size yard.
The fussiest of buyers will be most impressed with this truly outstanding home.

Description:
Country lifestyle for the family on 1 acre in Clunes
Introducing a gorgeous three bedroom home set on a private allotment of approximately 1acre (4012m2), it is constructed of beautiful Western Red Cedar and offers 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, large renovated kitchen with combined dining area and sliding door to outside, family sized bathroom and a fabulous living area with split system heating/cooling. The block is fully fenced, with colorbond front fencing for security and privacy. Outside you will find a huge carport- you could even fit a caravan or boat- stable with a secure post and rail day yard for the pony, storage shed for the motorbikes (or anything that takes your fancy!) and a new timber deck at the front of the home for enjoying a cold drink on a summer's evening. With ample room to build a shed if need be (STCA) this block offers you the country lifestyle you've been searching for within a Km of the historic township of Clunes. Throw in town water, and what are you waiting for? Book an inspection today!

Description:
4 Bedroom Family Home, Close to the Clunes Primary School
This approx. 7 year old quality built brick veneer home is literally a hop, skip and jump from the Clunes Primary School. The township of Clunes is well known for its original main street, book fair and offers excellent township amenities plus being 30 minutes drive from Ballarat. The home measures approx. 21.55 squares of floor living space consisting of 4 bedrooms, the master has a semi ensuite plus walk in robe, the other 3 bedrooms have BIR's. The home has two toilets and a study nook is just off the tiled hallway. The open plan living area combines a spacious meals area, large formal lounge room with feature wood heater. The timber kitchen really compliments the home with a breakfast bar, dishwasher, electric stove and oven plus a walk in pantry. The entire home is light with large windows throughout.
Outside features a big 1000m2 or 1/4 acre allotment, the garden is well established and offers lovely shade tress, raised garden beds, a cubby house, paved paths and outdoor area. There is also a couple of carports plus a steel framed workshop with concrete floor. Services connected include town water and sewerage.

Description:
Evansford Presbyterian Church "Circa 1909"
Surround yourself in history and elegance in this tastefully renovated church, located in Evansford sitting high on the hill amongst 2 acres, with beautiful scattered gum trees is this old "Presbyterian Church."
This unique property offers open plan living with polished floorboards throughout, handcrafted wooden staircase leading to a luxurious master bedroom which can accommodate the most lavish furnishings. As you wind your way downstairs you will notice the delightful warm living area, which offers a free standing wood heater, high cathedral ceilings and original entrance to the Church with an etched glass window. Open plan dining offers an elegant setting for those who love to entertain and the kitchen offers a functional balance of beauty, comfort and convenience with country views out your kitchen window.The second bedroom is spacious and the bathroom is fully renovated with shower, a good sized laundry and there is also a separate toilet.
Outside there is a storage shed, water tank and the property is fenced.
This exclusive property would make an ideal B & B, weekender or home, with only minutes to the historic townships of Clunes and Talbot.
Insights: 7 other 2 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet country 3 bedroom home
Set on approx. 3/4 of an acre located at the end of a quiet street on the high side of town, you will find this lovely 3 bedroom home, recently renovated with views to surrounding hills. Polished timber floors, a feature of the wide entrance & living room, along with the wood fire and split system gives a welcoming country feel. The new quality kitchen has a light, bright sunny aspect, plenty of cupboard space including a walk in pantry & electric cooking. Watch the sun rise while having breakfast in the dining/sunroom and the sun set by the fire in the living room. The large bathroom, also less than 12 months old has plenty of room to move, with an extra toilet off the laundry. Gas HWS, 8mx5m shedding, easy care garden & good fencing with enclosed yard all together make a lovely home, weekender or terrific investment.

Description:
Freehold Walk in/Walk out fully equipped café/wine bar/restaurant
Don’t miss this rare opportunity to invest in a commercial property cira 1860’s in the historical main street of Clunes.
Features include:
* Functional Kitchen
* Double fronted windows with original sign writing
* High ceilings with skylight
* Original period display shelving
* Wrought iron wine stand
* Indoor/outdoor entertaining perfect for intimate musical events
* Garden courtyard
* Rear access
* Disabled facilities

Description:
"Country Entertainer" Set On Approx 2 Acres - Bring The Pony Along
Set on approximately 2 acres in a quiet location stands this well maintained and beautifully, presented family friendly home. Lots of natural light, plenty of living space with tiled flooring and carpet. Modern open plan kitchen/living area, lounge room with split system and woodheater, 3 good size bedrooms with BIR's, bathroom has both shower and bath and good size laundry. There is a huge private yard for the young family with inground, salt water swimming pool, which is solar heated, low maintenance and fully fenced. The huge undercover entertaining area has a built in barbecue.
The lovely front veranda is also another place to sit back, relax and enjoy that wonderful country life style.
There is also a single lock up garage with concrete floor, 4 bay carport, 2 lock up dog yards, both town and tank water and the property is well fenced. This property is a must to see!
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern 4 B/R Home, 10 Acres With A Relaxing View
With instant street appeal, this well built and recently updated home sits on the Ballarat side of Clunes, only 5 minutes to the Clunes township and 15 minutes to the Western Highway via Miners Rest. The home offers full return veranda and large windows allow plenty of natural light. There is a formal lounge and separate dining room plus four bedrooms, a nursery and study. Three of the bedrooms have BIR's. The family bathroom is brand new plus a second shower and vanity have been installed in the laundry. The brand new kitchen offers a dishwasher, stainless steel sink, electric cooktop and oven plus island bench and an informal dining area. Outside features a sealed roundabout driveway leading to a double carport and brick garage 8m x 7m with concrete floor and power. There are established gardens, horse round yard, dam and entertaining area. The 10 acres is cleared and sits on a corner block with 2 road frontages, excellent views of Mount Beckworth and room for your livestock. There are two concrete tanks holding approximately 44,000 litres of water, one supplies the home and is topped up by the town water supply.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.
